review_text: I loved using this product at first and it made quality ice cream that was great for at home or social events.  However, the paddle broke 2 months into it and I have been unable to use the ice cream maker since then. I wish the plastic paddle was a little more durable.
product_name: Cuisinart ICE-20 Automatic 1-1/2-Quart Ice Cream Maker, White
